Question: Although **** was close to both parents he was rather disappointed in his father's academic approach to faith.
Hints: This person went on to say "the main point is to get a young and insecure science into a place of safety during an earthquake".
In 1895, this person studied medicine at the University of Basel.
In 1908, this person became an editor of the newly founded Yearbook for Psychoanalytical and Psychopathological Research.
